H0.text: What is the title of the film considered to be the debut of cartoon character Mickey Mouse. Steamboat Willie

H1.text: What is the title of the film considered to be the debut of cartoon character Mickey Mouse. The Band Concert

H2.text: What is the title of the film considered to be the debut of cartoon character Mickey Mouse. Plane Crazy

H3.text: What is the title of the film considered to be the debut of cartoon character Mickey Mouse. Timeless River

A4.text: Steamboat Willie is considered the public debut of Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse

A5.text: although both [Mickey and Minnie] appeared months earlier in a test screening of Plane Crazy and the then unreleased The Gallopin' Gaucho
